message.content:
cs.SE, cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.HC. 

The paper discusses the development of a tool for automating the generation of safety assurance cases, which is a software engineering process. Therefore, cs.SE (Software Engineering) is the most likely category. The paper also discusses the use of the tool in various Cyber Physical System domains, which involves security and safety concerns, making cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) and cs.SY (Systems and Control) likely categories as well. The tool uses accumulated evidence and developer expertise to construct a safety case, which involves artificial intelligence techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a possible category. Finally, the paper discusses the limitations of current manual methods, which can be improved through human-computer interaction, making cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) a possible category as well.
